title: Authentication Error
body: So recently my client has been having a slight issue although it has occurred in the past I thought it would of been a 1 off thing. So to explain what happens I will run up the start up process of exactly what I do and hopefully you guys can distinguish what I need to do. First up I open up the league client from my homepage on my laptop, Next I type in my username then my password then proceed to click sign in... so as you could imagine very average nothing out of the ordinary in that sign in process, yet it has popped up an alert that something went wrong with authenticating my account of some sort, it provides links but NONE of them go to anywhere. It's troubling me cause I've spent quite a bit in money and time on this game and I would like to be able to play it. Some times it says I may be offline and I tried multiple strategies to get pass it but even IF I DO IT JUST GIVES ME THE AUTHENTICATION PROBLEM! I've reinstalled the client and waited 4 hours for the bloody thing and it let me play 1 game, I'm grateful for that but seriously.

replies.body:
Can you provide a screenshot of the error you're encountering? Also, this might be a connection issue, so I'd definitely give the steps in this article a shot:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

Keep me updated!
Turns out it was a windows 10 DNS error nothing wrong with the client! It just requires you to manually input an address which you can easily find on the web! thank you for the reply though!
Ah, that'll do it. Thanks for letting me know! I'll keep that in mind :)
